mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(grop_purchs_prodct_seq) FROM grop_purchs_tb WHERE stat LIKE '모집중' AND ordr_end_dat >= CURDATE()

SELECT A.grop_purchs_prodct_seq, A.prodct_nme, A.grop_purchs_seq, A.ordr_star_dat, A.ordr_end_dat, A.min_ordr_amont, A.max_ordr_amont, A.exist_pric, A.sel_pric, A.titl, A.stat, A.main_img, COUNT(B.ordr_numbr_seq) AS joinPersns FROM grop_purchs_tb AS A LEFT JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb AS B ON A.grop_purchs_seq = B.grop_purchs_seq WHERE A.stat LIKE '모집중' AND A.ordr_end_dat >= CURDATE() GROUP BY A.grop_purchs_prodct_seq ORDER BY A.grop_purchs_prodct_seq;

SELECT A.grop_purchs_prodct_seq, A.prodct_nme, A.grop_purchs_seq, A.ordr_star_dat, A.ordr_end_dat, A.min_ordr_amont, A.max_ordr_amont, A.exist_pric, A.sel_pric, A.titl, A.stat, A.main_img, A.detl_img1, A.detl_img2, A.detl_img3, COUNT(B.ordr_numbr_seq) AS joinPersns FROM grop_purchs_tb AS A LEFT JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb AS B ON A.grop_purchs_seq = B.grop_purchs_seq WHERE A.grop_purchs_prodct_seq = #{gropPurchsProdctSeq};
